scripts.deploy:client:build: cd apps/client && npx eas-cli build --platform all --profile production
scripts.deploy:client:preview: cd apps/client && npx eas-cli build --platform all --profile preview
scripts.client:update:preview: cd apps/client && npx eas-cli update --channel preview --message
scripts.client:update:production: cd apps/client && npx eas-cli update --channel production --message
scripts.deploy:api: echo 'Push a version tag to deploy API: git tag v1.0.0 && git push origin v1.0.0'
